HireBound is a conversational recruiting platform to engage & nurture talent giving them personalised experience throughout the recruitment cycle.  It helps you streamline each step of your recruiting process, and automate candidate reach out via text, whatsapp and email nudges.

HireBound Chrome extension allows you to:

- Add candidate from LinkedIn and Naukri.com with 1-click
- Enrich candidate profile with verified email & phone numbers
- Send multi-channel sequences via email, whatsapp and text
- Know which candidate is already in an active pipeline, to avoid reaching out twice from the team
- See the candidateâ€™s activity history, add notes & comments, without leaving LinkedIn
